section.37: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu 'Imran Al-Jawni said:"Jundab said: 'So and so told me that the Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: The slain will bring his killer on the Day of Resurrection and will say: Ask him why he killed me.
